attributes.action: ensure that veterans interests including priority NHS treatment for war pensioners be implemented
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since 1953 tthe National Health Service has supposed to have offered priority treatment to war pensioners for their injuries or conditions. This never happens. Despite reminders sent to Chief Executives these are regularly ignored. Subsequently Health care professionals are ignorant of these rules. And veterans do not get priority.
